name: Tom Kelsey
content: Prof. Tom Kelsey Tom Kelsey PhD, University of St Andrews 1999 Professor School of Computer Science University of St Andrews Tel/Fax: +44 1334 463249 / +44 1334 463278 Email: Directions: https://goo.gl/maps/o2dJDndcPzDM2Xeq9 Expertise: AI in healthcare, Oncofertility, Reproductive Endocrinology & Physiology EXPAND ALL SECTIONS COLLAPSE ALL SECTIONS Introduction I am a Professor of Health Data Science, and also: My primary research interests are oncofertility (preservation of fertility after treatment for cancer), reproductive endocrinology and physiology in assisted conception, health data science, and the use of Large Language Models (LLMs) in medicine. I've also worked in AI search and combinatorics.
